name: Guild of European Business Travel Association
goal: GEBTA, the Guild of European Business Travel Agents, represents the travel management industry with some 300 major travel management companies generating a significant part of the business travel sales in Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Package travel directive
Competition issues
Visa
VAT
Passenger regulations
insurance mediation
Tourism issues
